# =================================================================================================================== #
#                                                                                                                     #
# Imported library freetype !                                                                                         #
# (see glitch/examples/glexf/projects/cmake/cmakelists.txt for a detailled explanation)                               #
#                                                                                                                     #
# =================================================================================================================== #

cmake_minimum_required (VERSION 2.8.1)
find_package (mk)

# =================================================================================================================== #

mk_project (freetype)

# =================================================================================================================== #

mk_add_imported_library (freetype)

# =================================================================================================================== #

function (freetype_iproperties_debug target config)
    set_target_properties (${target} PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION_${config} 
                                                 "${GLITCH_ROOT_PATH}/source/freetype/objs/Freetype237ST_D.lib")
endfunction()

function (freetype_iproperties_release target config)
    set_target_properties (${target} PROPERTIES IMPORTED_LOCATION_${config} 
                                                 "${GLITCH_ROOT_PATH}/source/freetype/objs/Freetype237ST.lib")
endfunction()

# =================================================================================================================== #

mk_finalize()
